title: Setting Up 750 Grain Drill for Kernza

tasks.task: Setting up and operating a 750 grain drill for Kernza wheatgrass seeding.
subtasks: Adjusting seed metering mechanism for precise release.
Selecting and blocking seed cups for proper coverage.
Monitoring seed dispensing rate using weight checks at various speeds.
Implementing field calibration with GPS to confirm accurate seeding rate.
Managing half-speed gears and clutch engagement for optimal performance.
Addressing mechanical modifications (e.g., cutting corners, using an air hammer) to facilitate gear adjustments.

tasks.task: Preparing a farm field for Kernza drilling.
subtasks: Adjusting drill depth to half-inch for proper seed placement.
Ensuring appropriate seed placement intervals (seven and a half inches).
Aligning drill arm engagement and pressure valve activation.
Preparing the drilling area (e.g., leveling, hydration).
